articles.title: Where are the cast of the Full Monty now? - Daily Mail
articles.description: The original cast of the 1997 British film hit The Full Monty have reunited for a new original series of the same name, set to air on Disney+ - with Robert Carlyle returning as Gaz.
articles.content:
The original cast of The Full Monty are set to reunite for a new series of the same name, set to air on Disney+, with filming commencing this week in Manchester and Sheffield.
